definition: Gestalt psychology (concerned with treating a subject as a coherent whole)

pinyin: wan2 xing2 xin1 li3 zhi4 liao2

sentences.english: I saw a lot of people in Gestalt as trying to be or believing in self-sufficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我在完形治療中看到很多人試圖達到或相信可以自足。

sentences.english: Cloze is to test the students' comprehensive abilities.
sentences.chinese: 完形填空題是一種測試綜合能力的題型。

sentences.english: Ten dollars is a small sum.
sentences.chinese: 十美元是初二英語完形填空個小數目。

sentences.english: So you see, that's my point, that now, in the last decade, Gestalt has really moved into its dialogical phase.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，最近十年，完形治療才進入對話階段。

sentences.english: It does not know whether or not other psychic gestalts like Itself may exist.
sentences.chinese: 它不知道是否有象它自己一樣的心靈完形存在。

sentences.english: It shows that, generally speaking, cloze test is a valid testing format.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，完形測試總的來說是一種有效的測試形式。

sentences.english: Gap-filling is one of the varieties of cloze.
sentences.chinese: 完形填充是完型填空的一種變體形式。

sentences.english: The atmic plane is filled with gestalt consciousnesses experiencing many incarnations simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 阿特密層充滿同時經歷許多化身的意識完形。

sentences.english: The last two question is blanks and translation.
sentences.chinese: 最後兩個題就是完形填空和漢譯英了。

definition: to fill a job vacancy/to fill in a blank (e.g. on questionnaire or exam paper)
new word (in textbook)/word that is unfamiliar or not yet studied/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
